trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> in that it displays a list of items.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle é semelhante a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>em que ele exibe uma lista de itens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The main difference is that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control provides a number of different ways items can be viewed by the user.
trans-unit.target: A principal diferença é que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle fornece um número de itens de maneiras diferentes pode ser exibido pelo usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The ListViewItem class defines the appearance, behavior, and data associated with an item that is displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe ListViewItem define a aparência, comportamento e dados associados a um item que é exibido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: ListViewItem objects can be displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in one of four different views.
trans-unit.target: ListViewItem objetos podem ser exibidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle em uma das quatro diferentes modos de exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Items can be displayed as large or small icons or as small icons in a vertical list.
trans-unit.target: Itens podem ser exibidos como ícones grandes ou pequenos ou como ícones pequenos em uma lista vertical.

trans-unit.source: Items can also have subitems that contain information that is related to the parent item.
trans-unit.target: Itens também podem ter subitens que contêm informações relacionadas ao item pai.

trans-unit.source: The fourth view style, details view, allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that can be used to identify the information being displayed in a subitem.
trans-unit.target: O quarto estilo de exibição, exibição de detalhes, permite que você para exibir o item e seus subitens em uma grade com cabeçalhos de coluna que pode ser usado para identificar as informações que está sendo exibidas em um subitem.

trans-unit.source: Most of the properties of the ListViewItem class provide ways to change the display of the item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: A maioria das propriedades da classe ListViewItem fornece maneiras de alterar a exibição do item no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle está associado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A> properties allow you to change how the text of the item is displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A>propriedades permitem que você altere como o texto do item é exibido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A> property allows you to specify the image to load from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade permite que você especifique a imagem para carregar a partir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>que é atribuído ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle (definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>Propriedades da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Items can display check boxes in order to obtain item choices from the user in a way similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Itens podem exibir caixas de seleção para obter opções de item do usuário de maneira semelhante a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Checked%2A> property to determine if an item is checked, or to select or clear the check box at run time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Checked%2A>propriedade para determinar se um item estiver marcado, ou para marcar ou desmarcar a caixa de seleção em tempo de execução.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: Items can display any number of subitems when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> and columns are defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Itens podem exibir qualquer número de subitems quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>propriedade associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>e colunas são definidas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add subitems to an item by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar subitens a um item, chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection.Add%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.SubItems%2A> property allows you to gain access to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection> class and its members.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.SubItems%2A>propriedade permite que você acesse o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection>classe e seus membros.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.SubItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some of the properties and methods of the ListViewItem class are item-specific versions of properties and methods in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Algumas das propriedades e métodos da classe ListViewItem são versões específicas do item de propriedades e métodos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.EnsureVisible%2A> method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> version of the method, but the ListViewItem version affects only the current item.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.EnsureVisible%2A>método é semelhante de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>versão do método, mas a versão de ListViewItem afeta apenas o item atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.EnsureVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListViewItem class also provides methods that are not versions of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> methods.
trans-unit.target: A classe ListViewItem também fornece métodos que não são versões de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BeginEdit%2A> method places the item's text into edit mode so the user can change the item's text (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BeginEdit%2A>método coloca o texto do item no modo de edição para o usuário pode alterar o texto do item (quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle é definido como `true`).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BeginEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Clone%2A> method allows you to create copies of existing ListViewItem objects to reuse in other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Clone%2A>método permite que você crie cópias de objetos existentes de ListViewItem reutilizar em outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Clone%2A>
